name: Roe AI
headline: Data warehouse to query unstructured data like docs, webs, imgs & more
description:
Roe AI is the next-generation AI-powered data warehouse to store, process, and query unstructured data like documents, websites, images, videos, and audio. By making the impossible data possible, we help data teams become strategic enablers.

Data lies at the heart of strategic decision-making, steering enterprises toward their KPIs. Roe AI accelerates these successes by providing intuitive and intelligent multi-modal data extraction, data classification & multi-modal RAG via Roe's SQL engine.

Book us a call to discover how Roe AI can take your enterprise's data intelligence to the next level https://cal.com/team/roe-ai/hi-roe

The future of data science is here.
tags: industry:generative-ai; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:big-data; industry:infrastructure; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Richard Meng, Founder
founders.description:
Cofounder & CEO of Roe AI, democratizing the access of safe, steerable, scalable Gen AI to enterprise

ex-tech lead of Gen AI @ Snowflake.
Snowflake Summit 2023 Speaker.
ex-tech lead of Knowledge Graph & Generative Skill Assessment at LinkedIn
2014-18 UC Berkeley CS & Stats

founders.name: Jason Wang, Founder
founders.description: Hi, I'm Jason. With a background in both Computer Science and Applied Mathematics from UC Berkeley, I've had the privilege of diving deep into AI, product, and infrastructure roles at leading tech companies including Meta, Robinhood, and most recently, Retool. Excited to shape the future of AI-driven solutions!

# Agentic Unstructured Data Analytics
Extract, analyze, aggregate unstructured data insights with AI agents.
[Read our blogs](https://getroe.ai/</blogs>)[Book a demo session](https://getroe.ai/<https:/cal.com/team/roe-ai/hi-roe>)
Built by data experts from Snowflake, Meta, and LinkedIn. Trusted by leading organizations‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67051a01903126380993e9d7/679658b1b198d810fe74bfa8_Logo01.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67051a01903126380993e9d7/679658b0b84ddfdd8161f639_Logo02.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67051a01903126380993e9d7/679658b0ad552d8d40d742f2_Logo03.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67051a01903126380993e9d7/679660ff552d5881235ec16e_Logo04.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67051a01903126380993e9d7/679665261ee23d2cdc103446_Logo05.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67051a01903126380993e9d7/679660ffd96dc85d8bd3f15f_Logo06.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67051a01903126380993e9d7/6796652608ff0a9f00227e0d_Logo07.svg)

Insurance

Unlock your most unstructured data
Agentic web analysis
  * Merchant homepage
  * Social media
  * Business registry
  * E-commerce listings


Agentic doc analysis
  * Decades of long documents with no metadata
  * Multimodal charts, tables, layouts
  * 300 pages++


Agentic photo analysis
  * Complex photos in retail execution
  * All kinds of operational planogram, storefront, layout, packaging
  * Human-level intelligence


Business units are relying on a large number of long, complex documents
  * Assess risk in a complex commercial financing situation
  * Assess compliance rules based on the fund prospectus
  * Benchmark peer rate changes based on insurance fillings
  * Benchmark non-GAAP metrics in SEC documents


Any data
Agentic ontology building & analytics
Like SQL on Steroids
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67051a01903126380993e9d7/6717a8fae7b2fb4fa277cd07_Canvas.svg)
Investment Compliance AnalyticsInsurance Competitive AnalyticsMerchant Compliance AnalyticsLoss Data Analytics
Document| Metadata| Risk Summary| Compliance Rule Validation 1| Compliance Rule Validation 2  
---|---|---|---|---  
Prospectus Fidelity| Management Fee...| Management risks...| ...| ...  
Prospectus Blackrock| Management Fee...| Diversification risks...| ...| ...  
Prospectus Fidelity| Management Fee...| Management risks...| ...| ...  
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67051a01903126380993e9d7/67063a6ec253565878734633_Assets%202.png)
Structured Compliance
Roe AI excels in processing large volumes of documents, including financial documents, prospectuses. Roe AI agents can carry the compliance rules and intelligently screen on hefty documents like human, significantly accelerates the time to compliance review.
Document| Filling Date| NAIC| Insurance Type| ROC| Rates  
---|---|---|---|---|---  
GEICO Filings| Feb 10, 2024| 35882| Auto| ...| ...  
Progressive Filings| Mar 5, 2024| 24260| Auto| ...| ...  
AAA Filings| Jan 28, 2024| 15539| Auto| ...| ...  
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67051a01903126380993e9d7/67063a6ec253565878734633_Assets%202.png)
Insurance Filings Analysis
By extracting quantitative structured and unstructured data like proposed rate adjustments, historical trends, and methodologies from insurance filings, Roe AI helps insurance companies keep up with the peer pricing competitive insights, approaching DOIs.
Website| Copy Infringement| Grammar Mistake| Offsite Transaction| Violate Rule X| Violate Rule Y  
---|---|---|---|---|---  
Tuppleware.com| False| None| False| False| False  
Tupplewares.com| True| Medium| True| False| True  
Tupplewareparty.com| True| High| True| True| True  
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67051a01903126380993e9d7/67063a6ec253565878734633_Assets%202.png)
Merchant Compliance Labeling
ROE AI enables risks team define custom criteria to extract the risk signals from businesses web presence, and consolidate the signals back to the risk modeling. This dramatically accelerates time to high quality data labeling.
Document| Date| Location| Type| Summary| Risks  
---|---|---|---|---|---  
Call Transcript| Feb 10, 2024| 123 Ave| Auto| ...| ...  
Email| Mar 5, 2024| 123 Ave| Auto| ...| ...  
Call Transcript| Jan 28, 2024| 123 Ave| Auto| ...| ...  
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67051a01903126380993e9d7/67063a6ec253565878734633_Assets%202.png)
Loss Data Analytics
ROE AI can analyze the emerging risks and trends from the unstructured loss data with AI Agents and data query.This allows carriers to better determine the pricing model and lose less money.
Features
[SQL-Powered AI Agents](https://getroe.ai/<#Source>)[Simple eval and fine-tuning workflow](https://getroe.ai/<#tuning>)[Enterprise-Grade Security](https://getroe.ai/<#Security>)
SQL-Powered AI Agents
Apply AI agents on unstructured data sources with ROE SQL.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67051a01903126380993e9d7/6707f865666a260bcb38cddf_Placeholder.svg)
Simple eval and fine-tuning workflow
Golden set curation, JSON evaluation and built-in one-click fine-tuning.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67051a01903126380993e9d7/6708085995033ca1c4742a30_AI%20tune.svg)
Enterprise-Grade Security
Roe AI is built with enterprise security measures.
SOC2 Type I
SOC2 Type II
Enterprise Data Security
Zero-day Data Retention
Roe AI v.s Chatbot Solutions
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67051a01903126380993e9d7/6706b012e10641e97eea9865_ROE.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67051a01903126380993e9d7/6706b0533f5bb49df3563298_Chatbot.png)
Roe AI
Transparency in everything
  * Interrogate documents in raw format in your own prompt so that the integrity of the documents is preserved.
  * The intermediate SQL results are easily accessible.
  * 100% correct math based on SQL aggregation.


Scale without sacrificing quality
  * Takes < 1 min to process a 100+ page document, without pre-indexing.
  * Massive parallel processing architecture allows interrogation of 10000+ docs within minutes.
  * Produce qualitative and quantitative answers that can be aggregated into higher-order, accurate insights.


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67051a01903126380993e9d7/6706b012e10641e97eea9865_ROE.png)
Chatbot Solutions
Blackbox in everything
  * Black box parsing documents into text loses the document integrity and discards tables, charts, and images.
  * Black box on how and which files are retrieved.
  * The math done by the chatbot cannot be trusted.


Quality degrades with more documents
  * Chatbots degrades with more documents. Poor in handling 100+ pages long documents.
  * Only < 5 files are allowed in the chat conversation. More files dramatically lower answer quality.
  * Only qualitative answers are produced, hard to be plugged into a financial model.


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67051a01903126380993e9d7/6706b0533f5bb49df3563298_Chatbot.png)
Roe introduced a solution that converted complex investment data, often locked in unstructured PDF formats, into structured datasets, which saved us 50% operations.
VP of Product

generated_description:
**Roe AI Overview**

Founded in 2023 and hailing from Y Combinator's Batch W24, Roe AI is a rising player in the world of data management. Based in San Mateo, CA, this compact team of three is on a mission to revolutionize how enterprises interact with unstructured data—think documents, websites, images, videos, and audio. Their tagline? Making the impossible data possible.

**What They Do**

Roe AI provides a next-generation AI-powered data warehouse designed to store, process, and query unstructured data. This isn't just about storing data; it's about empowering data teams to become strategic enablers within their organizations. They achieve this using intuitive multi-modal data extraction, classification, and an innovative SQL engine that makes querying straightforward.

**Core Features and Solutions**

- **Agentic Unstructured Data Analytics:** Roe AI excels at extracting insights from complex data, helping businesses navigate the intricate nuances found in documents and online content.
- **SQL-Powered AI Agents:** Their technology applies AI to unstructured data sources, functioning as "SQL on steroids" which brings a level of query power not commonly seen in the industry.
- **Enterprise-Grade Security:** Built with stringent security measures, Roe AI emphasizes data privacy and compliance, making it a trustworthy partner for enterprises.

**Industries Served**

Roe AI is particularly geared toward financial services, fintech, insurance, e-commerce, and retail. They help companies streamline their operations—whether it's reducing credit risks, improving compliance in insurance pricing, or making lengthy R&D documents queryable.

**Why It Matters**

Data is central to strategic decision-making, and Roe AI positions itself as a catalyst for companies striving to leverage their data more effectively. The promise of transforming vast amounts of unstructured data into actionable insights is not just appealing—it's essential in today's fast-paced business environment.

**Get Involved**

For enterprises looking to enhance their data intelligence, Roe AI invites you to explore their solution further. You can book a demo to see firsthand how they can unlock your organization's data potential.

Website: [getroe.ai](https://getroe.ai)  
Book a Call: [Schedule Here](https://cal.com/team/roe-ai/hi-roe)

In summary, Roe AI is set to make waves in the data analytics landscape, and if you're any organization dealing with the overwhelming flood of unstructured data, they might just be the partner you need.
